# Cothú Studio Project Instructions

## Project Overview
Art therapy studio website offering non-clinical DBT skills through group art, collage, open studio time, and guided art adventures.

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14+ (App Router)
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- Cal.com integration for booking

## Design Guidelines
- Monochrome black and white aesthetic
- Dark mode support
- Clean, minimalist design
- Focus on accessibility and user experience

## Project Status
✅ Project initialized
